operator.title: Discretizer
operator.synopsis: This is the Discretizer Operator, which discretizes the input data to three levels and set different results for each level.

text.paragraph: This operator discretize the feature data into HIGH, MID and LOW according to the threshold, and set different results for each level. As well as create different Pack objects for each level.

inputPorts.port: Receives a String object, containing the name of the feature, which is to be discretized.

outputPorts.port: Outputs a Pack object, which contains the current step model with the new high Condition Node added.
Outputs a Pack object, which contains the current step model with the new mid Condition Node added.
Outputs a Pack object, which contains the current step model with the new low Condition Node added.

parameters.parameter: Input the upper bound of the threshold here, which is between high and mid, e.g. 5.
Input the lower bound of the threshold here, which is between mid and low, e.g. 3.
Input the name of the discretized high result here, e.g. "RBBB".
Input the name of the discretized mid result here, e.g. "RBBB".
Input the name of the discretized low result here, e.g. "RBBB".
